pkgmetadata.longdescription: Relocated Data Oversampling for Imbalanced Data Classification // Relocates oversampled data from a specific oversampling method to cover area determined by pure and proper class cover catch digraphs (PCCCD). It prevents any data to be generated in class overlapping area. For more details, see the corresponding publication: F. Salam (2025) doi:10.1007/s10994-025-06755-8.
